sentence: Excellent Customer Service Adriene Fehringer
Service was always very prompt and attentive
We had a great stay with big comfortable beds wonderful staff and a terrific concierge
The room was excellent the accommodations where really nice and the personnel could not have been more professional and courteous
In particular the concierge Geri Digins
Good staff lovely rooms
Fresh and health options at every meal lovely service at the dinner
Great service by kindly smiling staff members
The staff accommodations were top notch to include some of the best tasting room service I have ever had
The service and stay were excellent

When contacting price line about the incident I was informed of Westin ’s comment made to Priceline “ We do n’t have a roach problem and this is the first I ’ve heard about this ” When leaving the hotel I sensed some anger from one of the staff members
When I told the front desk host checking me out she did not care and said oh the hotel was under construction
Finally both my wife and I thought the 24 service charge for room service was outrageous two continental breakfasts which nominally were 32 ended up costing over 64 with a tip
Upon check out no staff asked about my stay offered to show me my bill and the valet was so rude
We know other guest were bothered because when we called service express they said other guests had also called about the disturbance
BEWARE POOR SERVICE I have contacted the Westin Philadelphia twice within 48 hours regarding 2 extraneous “ refreshment center ” charges on my bill I left 2 messages and my call has not been returned
the room service was appalling

I phoned upon arrival to make the requests again and when the staff arrived they forget 13rd of my requests the room was not supplied with normal supplies including but not limited to slippers cotton swab cotton ball nail file kit enough toiletries and towels for 2 people which is what my reservation was for

This Westin is not worthy of a 4 star rating regardless of the construction that ’s ongoing for the following reasons the requests I made for “ additional items ” via the Mariot ap were not completed by the hotel staff
We were given a free drink voucher from the front desk at check in and were looking forward to sitting in the place we saw online and not a make shift bar in a conference room
